First, we recommend that the FDA institute a 24-hour turnaround for approving the importation of generic drugs that are in short supply from established manufacturers in other countries. Alternatively, the FDA can also grant immediate reciprocal approval for selected generic drugs manufactured in other countries.
9 Not having access to a drug must be considered far worse for the public the agency is charged to protect than any safety concerns that arise with the use of a generic drug that is made by an established manufacturer hitherto not authorized to sell in the United States.
